testcase.name: Test jenkins pipeline
ActionHandler should call performAction on MessageAction with the correct parameters when it receives a "sag" action message
ActionHandler should call performAction on PrivateMessageAction with the correct parameters when it receives a "fluester" action message
ActionHandler should call performAction on DiscardAction with the correct parameters when it receives a "ablegen" action message
ActionHandler should call performAction on InspectAction with the correct parameters when it receives a "untersuche" action message
ActionHandler should call performAction on InventoryAction with the correct parameters when it receives a "inv" action message
ActionHandler should call performAction on LookAction with the correct parameters when it receives a "umschauen" action message
ActionHandler should call performAction on MoveAction with the correct parameters when it receives a "gehe" action message
ActionHandler should call performAction on PickupAction with the correct parameters when it receives a "aufheben" action message
ActionHandler should call performAction on DungeonAction with the correct parameters when it receives a non standard action message
ActionHandler should call performAction on UnspecifiedAction with the correct parameters when it receives an action message for the dungeon master
ActionHandler should call performAction on InvalidAction with the correct parameters when it receives an invalid action message
ActionHandler should call performAction on HelpAction with the correct parameters when it receives a "hilfe" action message
ActionHandler should call performAction on ShowActions with the correct parameters when it receives a "aktionen" action message
ActionHandler should call performAction on MessageMasterAction with the correct parameters when it receives a "fluesterdm" action message
ActionHandler should call performAction on PrivateMessageAction when the dungeon master sends a message to a user
ActionHandler should call performAction on BroadcastMessage when the dungeon master broadcasts a message to all users
ActionHandler should call performAction on AddHp when the dungeon master adds hp to a user
ActionHandler should call performAction on RemoveHp when the dungeon master removes hp from a user
ActionHandler should call performAction on AddMana when the dungeon master adds mana to a user
ActionHandler should call performAction on RemoveMana when the dungeon master removes mana from a user
ActionHandler should call performAction on AddDamage when the dungeon master adds dmg to a user
ActionHandler should call performAction on RemoveDmg when the dungeon master removes dmg from a user
MessageAction should call sendWithRouting on the AmqpAdapter with the correct routingKey and payload
PrivateMessageAction should call sendToClient on the AmqpAdapter to both users with the correct payload

PrivateMessageAction should call sendToClient on the AmqpAdapter to the initial sender saying the recipient is not in the same room when trying to send a message to a character that is not in the same room

PrivateMessageAction should call sendToClient on the AmqpAdapter to the initial sender saying the recipient does not exist in the dungeon when trying to send a message to a character that does not exist
MoveAction should modify the position, call the functions to bind the client queues and call sendWithRouting on the AmqpAdapter when user moves to another room
MoveAction should modify the position to the room in the East when user moves east
MoveAction should modify the position to the room in the South when user moves south
MoveAction should modify the position to the room in the West when user moves west
MoveAction should call sendToClient on AmqpAdapter to the initial sender saying the room does not exist when the user tries to move to a direction where a room does not exist
MoveAction should call sendToClient on AmqpAdapter to the initial sender saying the user input an invalid direction when the user inputs anything but Norden, Osten, Sueden or Westen
MoveAction should call sendToClient on AmqpAdapter to the initial sender saying the room is closed when the user tries to move into a room that is closed
MoveAction should call sendToClient on AmqpAdapter to the initial sender saying the path does not exist
LookAction should call sendToClient on AmqpAdapter with the correct routingKey and payload
InventoryAction should call sendToClient on AmqpAdapter with the correct routingKey and payload
InspectAction should call sendToClient on AmqpAdapter with the correct routingKey and payload
InspectAction should call sendToClient on AmqpAdapter saying the user does not have the item when the user does not have the item
MessageMasterAction should call sendToClient on the AmqpAdapter to both the sender and the dungeon master with the correct payload
DiscardAction should call sendToClient on AmqpAdapter and modify the inventory of the character and the room items list when user discards an item
DiscardAction should call sendToClient on AmqpAdapter notifying the user that he does not own the item when he tries to discard an item he does not own
DiscardAction should call sendToClient on AmqpAdapter notifying the user that he does not own the item when he tries to discard an item that does not exist in the dungeon
PickupAction should call sendToClient on AmqpAdapter and modify the inventory of the character and the room items list when user picks up an item
PickupAction should call sendToClient on AmqpAdapter notifying the user that he does not own the item when he tries to pickup an item the room does not hold
InvalidAction should call sendToClient on AmqpAdapter notifying the tries to perform an invalid action when the user tries to perform an action that does not exist
HelpAction should call sendToClient on AmqpAdapter with the correct payload to the correct sender
ShowActions should call sendToClient on AmqpAdapter showing all available actions to the user
InvalidAction should call sendToClient on AmqpAdapter notifying the tries to perform an invalid action when the user tries to perform an action that does not exist
DungeonAction.performAction should call sentToClient notifying the user that he does not have the items to perform the action when the user does not have the required items to perform the action

DungeonAction.performAction should call sentToClient notifying the user that he is not able to perform the action in the room when the user does tries to perform an action that is not available in this room
DungeonAction.performAction should call sendToClient with the correct output and add hp to character when the event type is addhp
DungeonAction.performAction should call sendToClient with the correct output and remove hp to character when the event type is removehp
DungeonAction.performAction should call sendToClient with the correct output and add mana to character when the event type is addmana
DungeonAction.performAction should call sendToClient with the correct output and remove mana to character when the event type is removemana
DungeonAction.performAction should call sendToClient with the correct output and add dmg to character when the event type is adddmg
DungeonAction.performAction should call sendToClient with the correct output and remove dmg to character when the event type is removedmg
DungeonAction.performAction should call sendToClient with the correct output and add item to character when the event type is additem
DungeonAction.performAction should call sendToClient with the correct output and remove item to character when the event type is removeitem
DungeonAction.performAction should call sendToClient with the correct output when the user performs a global action
dungeonmaster should add amount of actual Damage to a Charakter
Jeff should get 1 Attack and then have 11 in total
Jeff should get so much attack so that he reaches his max Attack
dungeonmaster should add amount of actual HP to a Charakter
Jeff should get 1 HP and then have 51 in total
Jeff should get so much life so that he reaches his max life
dungeonmaster should add amount of actual Mana to a Charakter
Jeff should get 1 mana and then have 51 in total
Jeff should get so much mana so that he reaches his max mana
dungeonmaster should remove hp from player
Jeff should lose 2 Hp and then have 48 in total
Jeff should lose so much hp so that he dies and gets 100 hp again
PrivateMessageAction should call sendToClient on the AmqpAdapter to both users with the correct payload when dungeon master whispers to a player
BroadcastMessageAction should call broadcast on the AmqpAdapter when dungeon master broadcasts a message
dungeonmaster changes the position of Jeff (text)
dungeonmaster changes the position of Jeff
ToggleConnectionAction should modify the connection between two rooms and call broadcast on the AmqpAdapter when dungeon master toggles a connection
AddItem should add an item to the players inventory and call sendToClient on the AmqpAdapter when dungeon master adds an item to a players inventory
AddItem should increment the item count when the player receives an item he already owns
AddItem should call sendToClient on the amqpAdapter to notify the dungeon master that this item does not exist in this dungeon
AddRoomItem should add an item to the room and call broadcast on the AmqpAdapter when dungeon master adds an item to a room
AddRoomItem should increment the item count when the room receives an item he already has
AddRoomItem should call sendToClient on the amqpAdapter to notify the dungeon master that this item does not exist in this dungeon
RemoveItem should remove an item from the players inventory and call sendToClient on the AmqpAdapter when dungeon master removes an item from a players inventory
RemoveItem should decrement the item count when the player gets an item removed he already owns twice or more
RemoveItem should call sendToClient on the amqpAdapter to notify the dungeon master that the item does not exist in the dungeon when he tries to remove an item that does not exist in the dungeon
RemoveItem should call sendToClient on the amqpAdapter to notify the dungeon master that the character does not have the item when he tries to remove an item that the character does not have
RemoveRoomItem should remove an item from the room and call broadcast on the AmqpAdapter when dungeon master removes an item from a room
RemoveRoomItem should decrement the item count when the room gets an item removed it already has
RemoveRoomItem should call sendToClient on the amqpAdapter to notify the dungeon master that this item does not exist in this dungeon
RemoveRoomItem should call sendToClient on the amqpAdapter to notify the dungeon master that this item does not exist in the room
